  }
  return true

  antiShuffle('Hi') returns 'Hi'
  antiShuffle('hello') returns 'ehllo'
  antiShuffle('Hello World!!!') returns 'Hello!!!Wdlor'
  */
const antiShuffle = (s) => {
  const words = s.split(' ')
  const arr = []
  for (let i = 0; i < words.length; i++) {
    arr.push(words[i].charCodeAt(0))
  }
  arr.sort((a, b) => a - b)
  let res = ''
  for (let i = 0; i < words.length; i++) {
    res += words[i].charAt(0)
  }
  return res
}

  */
const sortArray = (array) => {
  const len = array.length
  const sorted = []
  let i = 0
  let j = 0
  let sum = 0
  let temp = 0
  let temp2 = 0
  while (i < len) {
    sum = 0
    while (j < len) {
      sum += array[j]
      j += 1
    }
    if (sum % 2 === 1) {
      sorted.push(array[i])
      i += 1
    } else {
      sorted.push(array[len - 1 - i])
      i += 1
    }
  }
  return sorted
}

 nextSmallest([5,1, 4, 3, 2]) == 2   nextSmallest([])== nu ll
  nextSmallest( [ 1, 1]) == null
  */
const nextSmallest =  (lst) => {
  if (lst.length === 0) return null
  let min = lst[0]
  let index = 0
  for (let i = 1; i < lst.length; i++) {
    if (lst[i] < min) {
      min = lst[i]
      index = i
    }
  }
  return lst[index + 1]
}
